en.heroTitle: Welcome to Oromo Artisan & Storyteller Marketplace
en.heroDesc: Discover, support, and celebrate Oromo culture through artisan crafts and oral storytelling. This platform connects artisans, storytellers, and customers in a vibrant, fair-trade community.

showcase.title: Featured Products
showcase.desc: See the most popular and unique Oromo artisan crafts, handpicked for you.

showcase.title: Oral Story Library
showcase.desc: Listen to captivating Oromo stories, legends, and folktales in audio and video.

showcase.title: Your Cart
showcase.desc: Review your selected items and proceed to secure checkout with local payment options.

showcase.title: Customer Dashboard
showcase.desc: Manage your profile, see your orders, and track your impact on the community.

showcase.title: Artisan & Storyteller Hub
showcase.desc: Meet the talented Oromo artisans and storytellers, explore their profiles, and discover their crafts and stories. Artisans can add products, track earnings, and share their culture with the world.

en.guidesTitle: How to Get the Most Out of This Marketplace

guides.text: Sign up or log in to personalize your experience and support your favorite artisans.

guides.textAfter: page to find crafts by category, location, or artisan.
page and share your favorites with friends.
and check out securely with local payment options.
to manage your profile and see your order history.

guides.text: Every purchase and story you enjoy helps preserve Oromo culture and supports local families.

steps.title: Browse Unique Products
steps.desc: Start by exploring beautiful, handcrafted goods made by Oromo artisans. Use filters to find crafts by category, location, or artisanâ€”thereâ€™s something for everyone!

steps.title: Enjoy Oral Stories
steps.desc: Listen to and watch traditional Oromo stories, legends, and folktales in audio and video formats. Share your favorites with friends and family.

steps.title: Easy Shopping & Secure Checkout
steps.desc: Add items to your cart and pay securely with Chapa, Telebirr, HelloCash, or Amole. Shopping is safe and simple for everyone!

steps.title: Support Local Communities
steps.desc: Your purchases empower Oromo artisans and storytellers, helping preserve culture and support families. Every action makes a difference!

om.heroTitle: Baga Nagaan Dhuftan Suuqii Ogeeyyii fi Oduu Guddifachaa Oromoo
om.heroDesc: Aadaa Oromoo suphaa, deeggaraa, fi kabajaa! Suuqichi ogeeyyii, oduu-guddattoota, fi maamiltoota walitti fiduun hawaasa wal-qixxummaa fi wal-deeggarsa qabu ijaaruu irratti fuulleffata.

showcase.title: Meeshaalee Filatamoo
showcase.desc: Meeshaalee Ogeeyyii Oromoo adda addaa fi kanneen beekamoo ilaalaa.

showcase.title: Galmee Oduu Afaani
showcase.desc: Oduuwwan, seenaa fi aadaa Oromoo sagalee fi viidiyoo taâ€™een dhaggeeffadhaa.

showcase.title: Kaartii Kee
showcase.desc: Meeshaalee filattee ilaali, kaffaltii nageenyaan raawwadhu.

showcase.title: Daayirektarii Maamilaa
showcase.desc: Piroofaayilii kee tooâ€™achi, ajaja kee ilaali, fi gumaacha kee hordofi.

showcase.title: Buâ€™uura Ogeeyyii fi Oduu-Guddattoota
showcase.desc: Ogeeyyii fi oduu-guddattoota Oromoo beekamoo waliin wal-baradhaa, hojii isaanii ilaalaa, fi aadaa isaanii addunyaa waliin qoodaa.

om.guidesTitle: Suuqii Kana Irraa Faayidaa Argachuuf Akkaataa

guides.text: Galmaaâ€™i ykn seeni, muuxannoo keetiif ogeeyyii jaallatamoo deeggari.
Bittaa fi oduuwwan kee aadaa Oromoo tiksu, maatii deeggaru.

steps.title: Meeshaalee Addaa Ilaali
steps.desc: Meeshaalee harka namaatiin hojjataman adda addaa ilaali. Gosa, bakka, ykn ogeessaatiin filadhu.

steps.title: Oduuwwan Dhaggeeffadhu
steps.desc: Oduuwwan, seenaa fi aadaa Oromoo sagalee fi viidiyoo taâ€™een dhaggeeffadhu. Hiriyyoota waliin qoodi.

steps.title: Bittaa Salphaa fi Nageenyaan
steps.desc: Meeshaalee kaartii kee irratti dabali, kaffaltii nageenyaan raawwadhu. Salphaa fi nageenyaan!

steps.title: Hawaasa Deeggaru
steps.desc: Bittaa fi oduuwwan kee ogeeyyii fi oduu-guddattoota Oromoo deeggaru, aadaa tiksa!
